title: Commertia Launches India's One of its Kind Real Estate Platform Dedicated to Commercial Real Estate
text:
Company : Commertia India Pvt. Ltd. Thursday, September 10, 2015 12:10PM IST (6:40AM GMT) Commertia Launches India's One of its Kind Real Estate Platform Dedicated to Commercial Real Estate Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
The largest online commercial property platform will showcase properties worth 20,000crores Platform will provide information on commercial properties across India and its allied services ​ Commertia Internet Pvt. Ltd announced the launch of India’s first online platform, dedicated to “commercial real estate segment” today. The website www.commertia .in will give an opportunity to the customers across the country, to buy, sell and lease a commercial property at a single click. The platform simplifies and aggregates commercial properties across India along with its highly informative tools which will fasten the decision making process for consumers. In the initial phase of the launch only the platform has listed inventory worth Rs. 20,000 crores which showcases around 15,000 properties. The platform will have options like Property Search Property Valuation, ROI Calculator, Commercial Yield, Valuation Heat Maps, Office Space Calculator, Locality Info and Property Comparison making it a customer’s one-stop shop for commercial realty space. It also connects end users to the service providers like lawyers, interior designers, architects, Property Managers, Office Furniture & Equipment dealers, Banks, Loan Agents etc. On this occasion, Mr. Shadab Malik, Founder & CEO, Commertia Internet Private Limited, commented, “We at Commertia are extremely glad to provide the one of its kind platform in the commercial real estate segment. With this platform, we aim to increase the accessibility and availability of commercial properties in India. Commertia is poised to bring transparency and advancement in this niche space. It takes broad vision of an entire industry to commit to such innovative idea. Commertia is exactly that idea reaching execution at the right time.” From office, shops, clinics, café, school to hospitals, hotels and SEZs, Commertia is a one stop solution for its customers. With the current market size of 22-25 % out of total real estate industry the commercial real estate is expected to grow at the rate of 15 % by 2020. We are having a very optimistic vision in this market and will decide our future plans of expansion based on the growth. The latest trends of commercial real estate space were discussed by key industry spokespersons – Mr. Sumesh President - COO - Business Development & Strategies at Sunteck Realty Ltd & Mr. Rushank Shah Promoter & Director Hubtown Ltd along with Mr. Shadab Malik Founder & CEO, Commertia Internet Pvt Ltd and Aamir Varcie- Director Commertia Internet Pvt Ltd. Commenting on the occasion Mr. Rushank Shah said , “In such a competitive market the choice for commercial properties is very limited and considering this is a high involvement purchase decisions for consumers, the giant player like Commertia encashes this opportunity and through this platform it brings together a complete range of solutions with a lot of research tools for consumers”. With an increasing presence of online and digital media in the real estate space, people prefer to use online platforms for their property related solutions. Commertia provides end to end service to its customers fulfilling their requirements in the commercial real estate segment. About Commertia Internet Pvt. Ltd Commertia Internet Pvt. Ltd is the leading online Commercial Real Estate market place with operations in around 70 different cities across India. It is also associated with many industry associations like Nasscom, CII, MCCIA, Indo-American chambers of commerce (IACC), EU India chambers. Commertia specializes in Commercial Real Estate, Interiors & Furnishing, Office Furniture & Equipment’s, Legal Services, Estate Agent, Property Management Service, Loan Agent, Commercial Loan & Business Loan, Property Valuation, Office Space Calculator, Commercial Yield, and ROI Calculator. Not only from office, shops, clinic, cafe to school, hospitals, hotels, SEZ, everything in commercial estate are going to be under the fingers.
